alert.note: Alert for Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 5:05PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Winds up to 40 mph will impact portions of Oneida, south central Bannock, southeastern Power and southeastern Cassia Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 504 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Pleasantview to 8 miles southwest of Juniper. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Malad, Malta, Arimo, Juniper, Pleasantview, Cherry Creek Rest Area, Holbrook Summit, Virginia, Stone, Sweetzer Summit, Samaria, Daniels Reservoir, Holbrook, Arbon, Sublett Reservoir, Malad Pass, Roy, Bridge and Hawkins Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
